description:
Need a quick random number? Do you have a copy of the top Random Number Generator in the App Catalog, our free Random Numbers app, but wish it had more features?  Random Numbers Pro provides all that and more in a convenient, stylish utility. 

FEATURES: 
Random Numbers Pro has six separate random number generation modes: 
* Integer Generator – generate any number of random integers 
* Coin Flipper – need to flip a coin? How about two? three? a dozen? With Random Numbers Pro, you can! 
* Die Roller – want to play a game, but can’t seem to find enough dice? Random Numbers Pro lets you roll up to a dozen dice at once! 
* Sequence Generator – with a random sequence, the random numbers generated are guaranteed to be unique 
* Lottery Quick Pick – you have a better chance of winning with random numbers! Random Numbers Pro includes presets for over 30 different U.S. state lotteries! With the tap of a single button you can draw a set of random numbers for your favorite lottery. Random picks usually lead to higher winnings! You can still choose to customize the app for a different lottery if yours isn't included.
* Keno Quick Pick – spend a lot of time in the casino? Let Random Numbers Pro help you make your picks! 

THEMES: Customize the app to appear how you like it with different themes! 

AD FREE: Don’t forget, with Random Numbers Pro, there are NO ADS! 

Random Numbers Pro is the must-have random number tool for every webOS user! 

Please send feature requests to support@lukewalkerapps.com, or through our website at http://lukewalkerapps.com.  Be sure to follow us on Twitter & Facebook!
